mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.doc_id AS "doc_id", a.se_id AS "se_id", a.qkzlfw AS "qkzlfw", a.zyglfw AS "zyglfw", a.jtbcyhlfw AS "jtbcyhlfw", a.jktyfw AS "jktyfw", a.jyhjcfw AS "jyhjcfw", a.ycsxzzfw AS "ycsxzzfw", a.ychzfw AS "ychzfw", a.ycyyfw AS "ycyyfw", a.ycyxzdfw AS "ycyxzdfw", a.ycxdzdfw AS "ycxdzdfw", a.ycyxjyfw AS "ycyxjyfw", a.yczzjhfw AS "yczzjhfw", a.ycsssjfw AS "ycsssjfw", a.ssmzglfw AS "ssmzglfw", a.zyjhfw AS "zyjhfw"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_information_sx_jbylfw( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, doc_id, se_id, qkzlfw, zyglfw, jtbcyhlfw, jktyfw, jyhjcfw, ycsxzzfw, ychzfw, ycyyfw, ycyxzdfw, ycxdzdfw, ycyxjyfw, yczzjhfw, ycsssjfw, ssmzglfw, zyjhfw ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{doc_id}, #{se_id}, #{qkzlfw}, #{zyglfw}, #{jtbcyhlfw}, #{jktyfw}, #{jyhjcfw}, #{ycsxzzfw}, #{ychzfw}, #{ycyyfw}, #{ycyxzdfw}, #{ycxdzdfw}, #{ycyxjyfw}, #{yczzjhfw}, #{ycsssjfw}, #{ssmzglfw}, #{zyjhfw} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_information_sx_jbylfw SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, doc_id = #{doc_id}, se_id = #{se_id}, qkzlfw = #{qkzlfw}, zyglfw = #{zyglfw}, jtbcyhlfw = #{jtbcyhlfw}, jktyfw = #{jktyfw}, jyhjcfw = #{jyhjcfw}, ycsxzzfw = #{ycsxzzfw}, ychzfw = #{ychzfw}, ycyyfw = #{ycyyfw}, ycyxzdfw = #{ycyxzdfw}, ycxdzdfw = #{ycxdzdfw}, ycyxjyfw = #{ycyxjyfw}, yczzjhfw = #{yczzjhfw}, ycsssjfw = #{ycsssjfw}, ssmzglfw = #{ssmzglfw}, zyjhfw = #{zyjhfw} WHERE id = #{id}
